title: The Smurfs season 2
description: The Smurfs are kind, little, blue creatures that live somewhere deep in the Forrest. They live in mushrooms and even have their own language. Their biggest enemy is Gargamel, the wizard who lives together with his cat Azraël nearby in the Forrest. Gargamal’s only goal in life is to catch and eat The Smurfs. But The Smurfs aren’t gonna let that happen anytime soon!
